claim_summary: An HHS press release (Dec 29, 2025) lists Arkansas' FY26 Rural Health Transformation Program award amount as $208,779,396.

source.title: CMS Announces $50 Billion in Awards to Strengthen Rural Health in All 50 States
source.issuing_body: U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) / Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS)
